Dmisc 0.2.1.9001

Cut3: quantiles

Source: R/cut3.R
cut3_quantiles.Rd

cut3_quantiles(tbl, var_name, weights, probs, ...)

Arguments

tbl

data.frame: Database connection or data.frame
var_name

character: variable name
weights

character: name of a numeric variable of weights
probs

See Hmisc::wtd.quantile
...

other arguments passed to quantile functions

Value

vector of specified quantiles

Details

Helper function for convert numeric variables into categorical variables based on their own quantiles.

See also

vignette("cut3", package = "Dmisc")

Examples

  (tbl <- data.frame(
    edad = 1:10,
    peso = round(runif(10)*10),
    grupo = sample(c("H", "M"), 10, replace = TRUE)))

#>    edad peso grupo
#> 1     1    1     M
#> 2     2    8     H
#> 3     3    6     H
#> 4     4    2     H
#> 5     5    0     H
#> 6     6    5     M
#> 7     7    5     H
#> 8     8    3     H
#> 9     9    7     M
#> 10   10    8     M

    cut3(tbl,
         "edad",
         c(0, cut3_quantiles),
         labels = c("1", "2", "3", "4"),
         groups = "grupo",
         weights = "peso",
         probs = c(0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1))

#>    edad peso grupo
#> 1     1    1     M
#> 2     1    8     H
#> 3     1    6     H
#> 4     2    2     H
#> 5     2    0     H
#> 6     2    5     M
#> 7     2    5     H
#> 8     3    3     H
#> 9     3    7     M
#> 10    4    8     M
